title: Bzzzt
description:
BZZZT is a fast-paced “ jump -dash-run” platformer game combining a nostalgic pixel-art look with a modern gameplay design. It was almost single-handedly made by one developer Karel Matejka, known as Ko.dll, as a tribute to beloved classic games. BMX Streets
Inspired by the 80’s tech revolution, this insanely detailed, pixel-art precision platformer transports you back in time, where you’ll get to experience a thrilling adventure, cleverly designed levels, a whole plethora of skills to unlock, and intense boss fights
